“Old man take a look at my life, I’m a lot like you, I need someone to love me, the whole day through” ~Neil Young #GQ #lyrics #musicmonday
“Pure hearts stumble, in my hands they crumble…” ~Matthew Bellamy / Muse #GQ #lyrics #musicmonday
“I don’t know what I want, but I know where I wanna be, and everywhere I go, I wish you were here with me…” ~Mason Jennings #GQ #lyrics #mm
“Life, is not a having and a getting, but a being and a becoming.” ~Myrna Loy #GQ #life #quote
“I would rather trust a woman’s instinct than a man’s reason.” ~Stanley Baldwin #GQ #life #quote
“He who confronts the paradoxical exposes himself to reality.” ~Friedrich Dürrenmatt #GQ #life #quote
I literally want to work until I’m in the grave.” ~KaDee Strickland #GQ #life #work #quote

Goodbye 2009 :) “The past is a foreign country—they do things differently there.” ~L. P. Hartley #GQ #quote #welcome2010
Awesome 2010 everyone! :) “Now is then’s only tomorrow.” ~Kenneth Patchen #GQ #quote
“Much of the vitality in a friendship lies in the honoring of differences, not simply in the enjoyment of similarities.” ~Anon @just1heather
“I do not pray for a lighter load, but for a stronger back.” ~Phillips Brooks #GQ #mindset #quote
@DrDevesh I am with you on that one :)
“If I had to live my life again, I’d make the same mistakes, only sooner.” ~Tallulah Bankhead #GQ #life #quote
“Leadership appears to be the art of getting others to want to do something you are convinced should be done.” ~Vance Packard #GQ #quote
@Jenn_Chinn Aww, I’ve missed you too, Jenn. My days have been good, thanks for asking :) How about you?
“The will to persevere is often the difference between failure and success.” ~David Sarnoff #GQ #success #quote
@Jenn_Chinn Oh, I agree totally. It just demonstrates the challenge to understand those who are in different circumstances than we are :)
“How can you expect a man who is warm to understand one who is cold?” ~Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn #quote
“The fence around a cemetery is foolish, for those inside can’t get out and those outside don’t want to get in.” ~Arthur Brisbane #quote
“Asking a working writer what he thinks about critics is like asking a lamppost what it feels about dogs.” ~John Osborne #GQ #quote
“I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.” ~Og Mandino #attitude #quote
“In the theatre the audience wants to be surprised—but by things that they expect.” ~Tristan Bernard #GQ #quote
“Love cannot express the idea of music, while music may give an idea of love.” ~Hector Berlioz #GQ #quote #musicmonday
@LiteraryNobody “Be regular and orderly in your life, so that you may be violent and original in your work.” ~Gustave Flaubert #GQ #quote :)

“I throw as hard as I can when I think I have to throw as hard as I can.” ~Walter Johnson #GQ #mindset #quote
“The art of teaching is the art of assisting discovery.” ~Mark Van Doren #GQ #teaching #quote
“Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another ‘What! You too? I thought I was the only one.’ ” ~C. S. Lewis #GQ #quote
“We think too much and feel too little.” ~Sir Charles ‘Charlie’ Chaplin #quote
“An artist is never ahead of his time but most people are far behind theirs.” ~Edgard Varese #quote

“Not a having and a resting, but a growing and becoming, is the character of perfection as culture conceives it.” ~Matthew Arnold #quote
“When you look at me, when you think of me, I am in paradise.” ~William Makepeace Thackeray #quote
“Any time you try to win everything, you must be willing to lose everything.” ~Larry Csonka #quote
“If one has not given everything, one has given nothing.” ~Georges Guynemer #quote
